txt.en: Hungry dwarves can be found on the front lines of the battlefield.\n\nYou should deliver honey cakes to hungry dwarves.
Delivered many honey cakes to hungry dwarves.
Deliver honey cakes to hungry dwarves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Delivered honey cakes to hungry dwarves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Sighild holds out a honey cake.\n\n'Oh, this isn't for you. I apologize if you thought I was giving this honey cake to you, I am just proud of this batch, is all. This is a special, and exceptionally hearty recipe that would keep a fighting dwarf full for a day! Hmm, are you venturing out into battle yourself? Would you take these honey cakes with you and deliver them to the hungry dwarves on the front lines? I would be most thankful!'

You have successfully delivered many of Sighild's honey cakes to hungry dwarves on the front lines of the battlefield. Those brave fighting dwarves will not forget all that you have done to assist in the war effort.
The Beorning Sighild has prepared a batch of war-time honey cakes to feed those on the front line.
